title: "Q1a: Bisection Method"
output: html_notebook
#Equation
f.acc<-function(x){
    0.2+(acos(1-x)-(1-x)*sqrt(2*x-x*x))/(pi)
  }
#Assigning values to the variables
xLeft <- 0
xRight <- 1
epsilon <- 1e-7
max <- 50
i <- 1
while (i < max && abs(xRight-xLeft) > epsilon){
  xMid <- (xLeft + xRight)/2
  if (f.acc(xMid) * f.acc(xRight) < 0){
    xLeft <- xMid
  }
  else{
    xRight <- xMid
  }
  i <- i +1
  cat("Value of mid after", i-1, "iteration is:", xMid, "\n")
}
